userData.Jokes: What do you call a paralyzed goat?@@Billy Idle.
How do astronomers organize a party?@@They planet.
Where do bees go to the toilet?@@at the BP station.
I have a phobia of over engineered buildings. I have a complex complex complex.
What did the duck say when he bought lipstick?@@Put it on my bill.
Why was six scared of seven?@@Because seven eight nine.
How do you make a tissue dance?@@Put a little boogie in it.
Is Google male or female?@@Female, because it doesn't let you finish a sentence before making a suggestion.
Did you hear about the kidnapping at school?@@It's okay, he woke up.
I was wondering why the ball kept getting bigger and bigger, and then it hit me.
What do you call a pig that does karate?@@A pork chop.
What do computers eat for a snack?@@Micro chips!
What do you call an deep sea Transformer?@@Octopus prime!
What type of sandals do frogs wear?@@Open toad!
What's the difference between a hippo and a Zippo?@@One is really heavy, the other is a little lighter.
Why couldn't the leopard play hide and seek?@@Because he was always spotted.
